story:
Once upon a time in a beautiful and peaceful land called Persia, there was a kind and gentle king who ruled with wisdom and love. The people of Persia were happy and prosperous, enjoying the riches of their land and the beauty of their culture.

One day, the king announced that he would hold a great feast and invite guests from all over the world to come and celebrate the beauty and wonder of Persia. The people were overjoyed and began to prepare for the feast.

As the day of the feast approached, the king's most trusted advisor, a wise and powerful sorcerer named Jafar, took on the task of preparing a special entertainment for the guests. Jafar decided to create the most beautiful and enchanting carpet the world had ever seen.

Jafar worked day and night, weaving intricate patterns and designs into the carpet, using the finest silks and gems from the farthest reaches of the kingdom. When he was finished, the carpet was truly a masterpiece, shimmering with all the colors of the rainbow and sparkling with a thousand tiny lights.

At the feast, the guests were awestruck by the beauty of the carpet. They marveled at the delicate patterns and the way the lights seemed to dance and shimmer on the surface.

But the carpet had a special secret. With a wave of Jafar's hand, it began to lift off the ground, soaring through the air like a magic carpet. The guests gasped in wonder as the carpet flew them over the breathtaking sights of Persia, from the snow-capped mountains to the shimmering sea.

The magic carpet became a symbol of the beauty and wonder of Persia, and the feast was remembered for generations as a time of joy and celebration.

And so, my dear daughter, as you drift off to sleep tonight, let the magic carpet take you on a journey of your own, exploring the wonders of the world and the depths of your own imagination. Sweet dreams and goodnight.
